name: Cloth
description: Basic material for clothing, provides no defense.

name: Bronze
description: Early metal alloy; decent strength, slightly soft.

name: Iron
description: Common metal; solid strength, widely used.

name: Steel
description: Refined iron alloy; stronger and more durable.

name: Silver
description: Precious metal; soft but effective against certain creatures.

name: Gold
description: Heavy, soft precious metal; decorative, not practical for combat gear.

name: Cold Iron
description: Specially forged iron; effective against fey, holds enchantments well.

name: Darkwood
description: Rare, lightweight, and durable enchanted wood.

name: Dragonhide
description: Tough scales from dragons; resistant to elements, excellent for armor.

name: Mithral
description: Lightweight, flexible metal; reduces armor penalties, magical properties.

name: Adamantine
description: Extremely hard metal; superior durability, can bypass resistances.

name: Star Metal
description: Meteoric metal; rare, holds strong magical potential.

name: Infernal Iron
description: Hellforged metal; infused with infernal power, rare and dangerous.

name: Living Wood
description: Fey-touched enchanted wood; sometimes self-repairing or alive.

name: Planar Crystal
description: Crystalline material from other planes; powerful magical conduit.

name: Void Metal
description: Mythic metal from the void; supreme magical and physical properties.
